sentences.sContent: We have had our first casualty. One runner has dropped out with cramp.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have had our first casualty. One runner has dropped out with cramp.
sentences.sCn: 我们有了第一位伤员，有一位队员因腿部痉挛退出了。

sentences.sContent: Any history of bombing must also be a history of civilian casualty, for bombing saves the lives of soldiers only at the expense of other lives.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any history of bombing must also be a history of civilian casualty, for bombing saves the lives of soldiers only at the expense of other lives.
sentences.sCn: 任何空袭的历史也必定是平民伤亡的历史，因为空袭救了士兵的性命只能以其他人的生命为代价。

sentences.sContent: The first item always on that was the overnight casualty report from Iraq and Afghanistan, and I would often come and see that had been circled by the president or that he would be reflecting on that.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first item always on that was the overnight casualty report from Iraq and Afghanistan, and I would often come and see that had been circled by the president or that he would be reflecting on that.
sentences.sCn: 上面的第一条永远是,这一晚在伊拉克和阿富汗,士兵的伤亡报告，我来的时候会看到那条消息,被布什总统圈了出来,他看着报告会陷入沉思。

synos.tran: 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室

phrases.pCn: 灾害保险；不幸事故保险

remMethod.val: cas(掉落) ＋ ual + ty(表物) → 掉落下来； 造成事故 → 伤亡(人员)； 伤亡事故
